title: @QuarkusIntegrationTest fails with aws-rest-lambda native docker image
body:
### Describe the bug

Following integration test steps for native docker image https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started-testing#native-executable-testing.

Integration tests are not run, fails in the setup ie.

```
023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]         Caused by:
2023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]         java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to successfully launch process '87302'. Exit code is: '125'.
2023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at io.quarkus.test.common.LauncherUtil.ensureProcessIsAlive(LauncherUtil.java:108)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at io.quarkus.test.common.LauncherUtil.waitForCapturedListeningData(LauncherUtil.java:71)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at io.quarkus.test.common.DefaultDockerContainerLauncher.start(DefaultDockerContainerLauncher.java:159)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at io.quarkus.test.junit.IntegrationTestUtil.startLauncher(IntegrationTestUtil.java:196)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusIntegrationTestExtension.doProcessStart(QuarkusIntegrationTestExtension.java:277)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusIntegrationTestExtension.ensureStarted(QuarkusIntegrationTestExtension.java:156)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusIntegrationTestExtension.beforeAll(QuarkusIntegrationTestExtension.java:123)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.574+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at org.junit.jupiter.engine.descriptor.ClassBasedTestDescriptor.lambda$invokeBeforeAllCallbacks$12(ClassBasedTestDescriptor.java:395)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at org.junit.platform.engine.support.hierarchical.ThrowableCollector.execute(ThrowableCollector.java:73)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at org.junit.jupiter.engine.descriptor.ClassBasedTestDescriptor.invokeBeforeAllCallbacks(ClassBasedTestDescriptor.java:395)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at org.junit.jupiter.engine.descriptor.ClassBasedTestDescriptor.before(ClassBasedTestDescriptor.java:211)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at org.junit.jupiter.engine.descriptor.ClassBasedTestDescriptor.before(ClassBasedTestDescriptor.java:84)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             at org.junit.platform.engine.support.hierarchical.NodeTestTask.lambda$executeRecursively$6(NodeTestTask.java:148)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger]             ... 51 more
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger] 
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger] HelloITTest FAILED
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger] 
2023-06-15T08:27:16.575+0100 [DEBUG] [TestEventLogger] Gradle Test Executor 4 FAILED
2023-06-15T08:27:16.983+0100 [DEBUG] [org.gradle.process.internal.DefaultExecHandle] Changing state to: SUCCEEDED
2023-06-15T08:27:16.983+0100 [DEBUG] [org.gradle.process.internal.DefaultExecHandle] Process 'Gradle Test Executor 4' finished with exit value 0 (state: SUCCEEDED)
2023-06-15T08:27:16.984+0100 [DEBUG] [org.gradle.internal.resources.AbstractTrackedResourceLock] Dispatch org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.testing.processors.RestartEveryNTestClassProcessor@2da14fee: released lock on worker lease
```


### Expected behavior

@QuarkusIntegrationTest should work with Quarkus rest lambda native docker image.

### Actual behavior

@QuarkusIntegrationTest tests fail with following error during the test setup

### How to Reproduce?

Run following command on the repo:
https://github.com/Hemantkumar-Chigadani/module2/tree/bug/aws-rest-lambda-integration-test

`./gradlew quarkusIntTest -Dquarkus.package.type=native --stacktrace --debug`

Error message on the terminal:


Error message in the test report:

>Failed to launch the application. The application logs can be found at: /Users/chigadani/source/github/module2/build/quarkus.log

OR

> Waited 60 seconds for build/quarkus.log to contain info about the listening port and protocol but no such info was found
>Failed to launch the application. The application logs can be found at: /Users/chigadani/source/github/module2/build/quarkus.log
